definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: perhaps be heedless (Ar. gafala be heedless, neglectful, inadvertent);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: shew heedlessness, Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיַּעְפִּלוּ]] [[לַעֲלוֹת]] Nu 14:44 (JE) they shewed heedlessness in going up (went up heedlessly), so de Dieu, cited (and allowed) by Di Buhl:Lex; >Thes al. shewed presumption (I. [[עפל]], this sense dub.).
